amendment.description: To modify a provision relating to transfers to the Acquisition Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5133 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5133 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S10884-10885; text: CR S10884-10885) To modify a provision relating to transfers to the Acquisition Fund.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5133 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5133 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
